Articles.Content:
Yop !

Here's my first attempt with F1HÃ‚Â²O speed boat in KSP 1.04 & i feel happy with the result !

With less mass & better balance maybe can make better speed but that's already not bad !

OFC it's a modded craft so this speed is not really legit ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Less than 2 min race for the first craft , One min race for the 3rd craft . "Dragster race"

F1HÃ‚Â²O First Strike : 621 m/s

![F1H2O.jpg?psid=1](https://ku75dq-sn3302.files.1drv.com/y3pYIUDlBW3kmXzRVmAwSQtgAW-IDHsNugXePt8rhVyZHCnNt9-YHVTTnYSHdK9ds5WvjDcDiAc4nqLYmpOF7_dINgSkVdf1M87vLBtCANj75UD3_ttcVwcg4ubbt-iLTyE5OWYoXgs-0s2Qi9u1_jEyAh3xXElBS5zMOMjPAj9W14/F1H2O.jpg?psid=1)

F1HÃ‚Â²O-V2 2nd Strike : 901 m/s

![F1H2O-V2.jpg?psid=1](https://ku75dq-sn3302.files.1drv.com/y3pSyrrFPjpx6ljqNcydaURl7VFNBmQ2BpPw7OIaoH_cJAC4SADbRSIQOr_FOJYa6biydLhXdadYMH8tD_3weRIZRVURNZxdhv-YBb4ePJ6Rv5npBpkgD-iTTABozvMU0uH-dT0OwmQQx1BzU369O-CdX0dKqoHiqptRNKMu5BRc-4/F1H2O-V2.jpg?psid=1)

F1HÃ‚Â²O-V3 3rd Strike : 1091 m/s

![F1H2O-V3.jpg?psid=1](https://hu6now-sn3302.files.1drv.com/y3pEjhzMnwmbxo2D7zlWf35wSCzgQ9bJKJUPUlwF12HzvssV6tQbVwy2Q2b1fOG019BxpZfWw5Ntf7ivedNA3XqBeCytG2_v6IulsP2YEpi1aXhAkfurkzGmbZEOj9gJo7gxD8I1JA2h9PCXgNBai1lsLmoV63A1XzCmRrc1-SMHPQ/F1H2O-V3.jpg?psid=1)

You need [ubio-welding] [mod](https://github.com/UbioWeldingLtd/UbioWeldContinued) to use this craft : (compressed with the standard Ubio setting )

F1HÃ‚Â²O [Craft :](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=B4FEC25180514B47!1751&authkey=!AI788QFotllO0ao&ithint=file%2Ccraft) 

F1HÃ‚Â²O [Weld :](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=B4FEC25180514B47!1752&authkey=!AMPxxgV409NsM1o&ithint=folder%2Ccfg) 

F1HÃ‚Â²O-V2 [Craft :](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=B4FEC25180514B47!1749&authkey=!AHT4VKZD-YycIj0&ithint=file%2Ccraft) 

F1HÃ‚Â²O-V2 [Weld :](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=B4FEC25180514B47!1754&authkey=!AIC18rzzd4AiUOE&ithint=folder%2Ccfg) 

F1HÃ‚Â²O-V3 [Craft :](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=B4FEC25180514B47!1750&authkey=!AJ1Gu8CX1V85AYY&ithint=file%2Ccraft) 

F1HÃ‚Â²O-V3 [Weld :](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=B4FEC25180514B47!1756&authkey=!AEtE_EWkGJfiIG0&ithint=folder%2Ccfg)

Note : You may crash or takeoff if you are not stable enough at start ! Start with 20% Thrust power , SAS On , After some Sec hit Full throttle & Burnnnnn !!!! Your max speed will depend of how fast you reach a stable state ! You can win or lost 300 m/s ( like a Dragster race )

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-19T04:42:38Z" title="07/19/2015 04:42  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 19, 2015</time> by ZLM-Master**

621 m/s????

That's like, Mach 2! What is this sorcery???
That boat is literally burning up in the water. That's pretty fast.

Yop !

The sorcery is revealed !

Enjoy ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
